Sandstorm in a Bottle.Description: Once per battle, when this Doodle gets sent out, summons Sandstorm if there isn't sandstorm already.

Misprint Trinket.Description: You are more likely to meet misprinted Doodles.

Strength Jelly.Description: Give this item to a Doodle to increase the power of one of their weak attacks. This item is consumed after use.

Lucky Pebble.Description: Give this item to a Doodle to improve the damage of its Earth-type attacks.

Earth Taffy.Description: A taffy made in Von Sweets' Factory. Give this item to boost the damage of one Earth-type attack. This item is consumed after use.

Frozen TV Dinner.Description: Give this item to a Doodle. They will be so distracted snacking on a delicious dinner that they will always attack last.

Air Taffy.Description: A taffy made in Von Sweets' Factory. Give this item to boost the damage of one Air-type attack. This item is consumed after use.

Spirit Taffy.Description: A taffy made in Von Sweets' Factory. Give this item to boost the damage of one Spirit-type attack. This item is consumed after use.

Basic Capsule.Description: Use this on a wild Doodle in an attempt to capture it.

Beast Candy Cube.Description: Some candy made in von Sweets' factory. Give this item to a Doodle to reduce the power of a Beast-type attack. This item is consumed after use.

Level-Up Cube.Description: When this item is used on a Doodle, the Doodle levels up!

Ice Taffy.Description: A taffy made in Von Sweets' Factory. Give this item to boost the damage of one Ice-type attack. This item is consumed after use.

Data Chip.Description: A data chip containing the blueprint of a mythical Doodle.

Espresso.Description: Give this item to a Doodle. This Doodle has a 25% chance to move first each turn.

Basic Taffy.Description: A taffy made in Von Sweets' Factory. Give this item to boost the damage of one Basic-type attack. This item is consumed after use.

Heal Jelly.Description: Give this item to a Doodle to have them heal after their health drops below half.  This item is consumed after use.

Spark Taffy.Description: A taffy made in Von Sweets' Factory. Give this item to boost the damage of one Spark-type attack. This item is consumed after use.

Candy Bag.Description: A candy bag with treats selected by Bonbon. Opening this bag gives you a random taffy and candy cube!

Battery.Description: Give this item to a Doodle to improve the damage of its Spark-type attacks.

Stat Candy.Description: This item lets you change the stat bonuses of a Doodle.

Bubblegum.Description: Give this item to a Doodle to improve the damage of its Food-type attacks.

Laminate.Description: Give this item to a Doodle to preserve it, stopping it from evolving.

Skin Trunk.Description: This leather briefcase lets you see all your un-equipped skins.

Champion Belt.Description: Give this item to a Doodle to improve its physical attacks.

Earth Candy Cube.Description: Some candy made in von Sweets' factory. Give this item to a Doodle to reduce the power of a Earth-type attack. This item is consumed after use.

Food Candy Cube.Description: Some candy made in von Sweets' factory. Give this item to a Doodle to reduce the power of a Food-type attack. This item is consumed after use.

Wake-up Jelly.Description: Give this item to a Doodle to wake it up when it gets put to sleep. This item is consumed after use.

Cursed Cloak.Description: Give this item to a Doodle. Disables the use of Support moves, but boosts Magical Defense by 50%.

Orb of Light.Description: This strange orb of light allows certain Doodles to evolve.

Dark Taffy.Description: A taffy made in Von Sweets' Factory. Give this item to boost the damage of one Dark-type attack. This item is consumed after use.

Disinfectant.Description: Use this spray on a Doodle to cure their disease.

Glasses.Description: Give this item to a Doodle to improve its accuracy of all its moves by 20%.

Mind Taffy.Description: A taffy made in Von Sweets' Factory. Give this item to boost the damage of one Mind-type attack. This item is consumed after use.

Crystal Taffy.Description: A taffy made in Von Sweets' Factory. Give this item to boost the damage of one Crystal-type attack. This item is consumed after use.

Opal Orb.Description: An Opal Orb containing the soul of Craig. Also allows you to encounter Maelzuri in the Crystal Caverns.

Level-Down Cube.Description: When this item is used on a Doodle, the Doodle levels down.

Basic Candy Cube.Description: Some candy made in von Sweets' factory. Give this item to a Doodle to reduce the power of a Basic-type attack. This item is consumed after use.

Spiky Thorns.Description: Give this item to a Doodle. If the holder is hit with a contact move, the attacker will also be damaged.

Light Candy Cube.Description: Some candy made in von Sweets' factory. Give this item to a Doodle to reduce the power of a Light-type attack. This item is consumed after use.

Scroll.Description: PLACEHOLDER TEXT - REPORT IF YOU CAN SEE THIS.

Determination Jelly.Description: Give this item to a Doodle. If they have full HP, the holder will survive an attack that would otherwise cause it to faint. This item is consumed after use.

Anti-Sleep Spray.Description: Use this item to throw it at a Doodle to wake them up.

Grease.Description: Give this item to a Doodle to prevent it from getting trapped or wrapped

Strange Solution.Description: A strange, reactive liquid that may make a certain Doodle evolve. It's cool to the touch.

Hidden Trait Trinket.Description: You are more likely to meet Doodles who have their hidden trait.

Roulette Ticket.Description: You can use this item for a free Roulette spin! However, the Doodle you get will be trade-locked.

Insect Taffy.Description: A taffy made in Von Sweets' Factory. Give this item to boost the damage of one Insect-type attack. This item is consumed after use.

Super Bandage.Description: These bandages heal a Doodle by 60 HP.

Orb of Darkness.Description: This strange orb of darkness allows certain Doodles to evolve.

Heart Capsule.Description: Use this on a wild Doodle in an attempt to capture it. Doodles caught in this capsule will become friendlier faster.

Starry Glasses.Description: Give this item to a Doodle and when it gets sent out, identifies the stars the opponents have.

Speed Jelly.Description: Give this item to a Doodle to have them boost their speed when their health gets low. This item is consumed after use.

Chain Preserver.Description: Stores a chain for later use.

Water Candy Cube.Description: Some candy made in von Sweets' factory. Give this item to a Doodle to reduce the power of a Water-type attack. This item is consumed after use.

Metal Taffy.Description: A taffy made in Von Sweets' Factory. Give this item to boost the damage of one Metal-type attack. This item is consumed after use.

Delicate Wing.Description: Give this item to a Doodle to improve the damage of its Insect-type attacks.

Mythic Taffy.Description: A taffy made in Von Sweets' Factory. Give this item to boost the damage of one Mythic-type attack. This item is consumed after use.

Training Helper.Description: If this item is on, every Doodle in your party gets experience in each battle.

Melee Taffy.Description: A taffy made in Von Sweets' Factory. Give this item to boost the damage of one Melee-type attack. This item is consumed after use.

Spectator Camera.Description: This camera allows you to spectate other people's battles.

Magnifying Glass.Description: Allows you to view wild Doodle's stats.

Master Cube.Description: [DEV ITEM] When this item is used on a Doodle, the Doodle levels up to 100!

Power Banana.Description: Use this on a Doodle in battle to temporarily raise its attack.

Used Crayons.Description: Give this item to a Doodle to have it restore a little bit of its health at the end of every turn.

Doodle Unlocker.Description: Lets you un-tradelock a Doodle obtained from using a Roulette ticket.

Defense Orange.Description: Use this on a Doodle in battle to temporarily raise its defense.

Money Trinket.Description: Allows you to get double money from tamer battles and help center requests.

Anti-Burn Spray.Description: Use this spray on a Doodle to cure their burn.

Light Taffy.Description: A taffy made in Von Sweets' Factory. Give this item to boost the damage of one Light-type attack. This item is consumed after use.

Gold Capsule.Description: Use this on a wild Doodle to capture it. This capsule will never fail on a wild doodle.

Ice Pack.Description: Give this item to a Doodle to improve the damage of its Ice-type attacks.

Anti-Paralysis Spray.Description: Use this spray on a Doodle to cure their paralysis.

Used Timber.Description: Give this item to a Doodle to improve the damage of its Fire-type attacks.

Polkadot Capsule.Description: Use this on a wild Doodle in an attempt to capture it. Has a higher chance to capture than Striped Capsules.

Pretty Seashell.Description: Give this item to a Doodle to improve the damage of its Water-type attacks.

Fire Candy Cube.Description: Some candy made in von Sweets' factory. Give this item to a Doodle to reduce the power of a Fire-type attack. This item is consumed after use.

Friendship Ribbon.Description: A doodle holding this item becomes friendlier faster.

Dark Chocolate.Description: Give this item to a Doodle. If they're a Food-type, they gain health at the end of each turn. If not, they take damage at the end of each turn.

Memento.Description: A memento from the good old days.

Trait Badge.Description: This badge allows you to swap a Doodle's trait.

Tally Counter.Description: Allows to see your current Doodle chain.

Lighter.Description: Give this item to a Doodle. At the end of each turn, it inflicts a burn on the user.

Crystal Candy Cube.Description: Some candy made in von Sweets' factory. Give this item to a Doodle to reduce the power of a Crystal-type attack. This item is consumed after use.

Mind Candy Cube.Description: Some candy made in von Sweets' factory. Give this item to a Doodle to reduce the power of a Mind-type attack. This item is consumed after use.

Striped Capsule.Description: Use this on a wild Doodle in an attempt to capture it. Has a higher chance to capture than Basic Capsules.

Speed Soda.Description: Use this on a Doodle in battle to temporarily raise its speed.

Air Candy Cube.Description: Some candy made in von Sweets' factory. Give this item to a Doodle to reduce the power of an Air-type attack. This item is consumed after use.

Dense Capsule.Description: Use this on a wild Doodle in an attempt to capture it. Has a higher chance to capture heavier Doodles.

Equipment Case.Description: A case that holds all your equipment.

Plant Taffy.Description: A taffy made in Von Sweets' Factory. Give this item to boost the damage of one Plant-type attack. This item is consumed after use.

Insect Candy Cube.Description: Some candy made in von Sweets' factory. Give this item to a Doodle to reduce the power of a Insect-type attack. This item is consumed after use.

Mythic Candy Cube.Description: Some candy made in von Sweets' factory. Give this item to a Doodle to reduce the power of a Mythic-type attack. This item is consumed after use.

Metal Candy Cube.Description: Some candy made in von Sweets' factory. Give this item to a Doodle to reduce the power of a Metal-type attack. This item is consumed after use.

Ice Cream Pop.Description: Feed this item to a Doodle to replenish all of their Moves' Uses by 10.

Resist Grapes.Description: Use this on a Doodle in battle to temporarily raise its magical defense.

Plant Candy Cube.Description: Some candy made in von Sweets' factory. Give this item to a Doodle to reduce the power of a Plant-type attack. This item is consumed after use.

Hidden Trait Badge.Description: [DEV ITEM] Changes Doodle's Trait to Hidden Trait

Strange Substance.Description: A strange, reactive substance allows certain Doodles to evolve. It's oddly warm to the touch.

Lesser Chain Ticket.Description: You can use this item to increase your current chain by 10! If it's a Mythical Doodle, it will only increase by 1. (Not tradable)

Greater Chain Ticket.Description: You can use this item to increase your current chain by 50! If it's a Mythical Doodle, it will only increase by 5. (Not tradable)

Spark Candy Cube.Description: Some candy made in von Sweets' factory. Give this item to a Doodle to reduce the power of a Spark-type attack. This item is consumed after use.

Running Shoes.Description: Give this item to a Doodle so it can flee from any wild Doodle without fail.

Worn-Out Mythical Trinket.Description: You are more likely to meet doodles of Legend. However, because it's worn out, the effect isn't as potent.

Beast Taffy.Description: A taffy made in Von Sweets' Factory. Give this item to boost the damage of one Beast-type attack. This item is consumed after use.

Strange Catalyst.Description: A strange, reactive item that may make a certain Doodle evolve. It doesn't seem safe to touch.

Power Jelly.Description: Give this item to a Doodle to restore their stats when they are lowered.  This item is consumed after use.

Swarm Snack.Description: These treats may be a little too tasty. Sprinkle these around and watch the Doodles swarm!

Choc Rocks.Description: A very addictive candy created by von Sweets.

Poison Candy Cube.Description: Some candy made in von Sweets' factory. Give this item to a Doodle to reduce the power of a Poison-type attack. This item is consumed after use.

Dark Candy Cube.Description: Some candy made in von Sweets' factory. Give this item to a Doodle to reduce the power of a Dark-type attack. This item is consumed after use.

Pristine Axe.Description: An axe used to chop down trees and wooden doors.

Candy Heart.Description: This weird object made of candy fits snugly in your hand, and feels as though it'll start beating.  Allows a certain Doodle to evolve.

Anti-Freeze Spray.Description: Use this spray on a Doodle to cure their freeze.

Water Taffy.Description: A taffy made in Von Sweets' Factory. Give this item to boost the damage of one Water-type attack. This item is consumed after use.

Weird Jelly.Description: Give this item to a Doodle to boost their attack and magic attack after they are hit with a super effective attack. This item is consumed after use.

Fire Taffy.Description: A taffy made in Von Sweets' Factory. Give this item to boost the damage of one Fire-type attack. This item is consumed after use.

Defensive Jelly.Description: Give this item to a Doodle to reduce the power of a super-effective attack. This item is consumed after use.

Ice Candy Cube.Description: Some candy made in von Sweets' factory. Give this item to a Doodle to reduce the power of a Ice-type attack. This item is consumed after use.

Silver Level-Up Cube.Description: When this item is used on a Doodle, the Doodle levels up three times!

Worn-Out Misprint Trinket.Description: You are more likely to meet misprinted Doodles. However, because it's worn out, the effect isn't as potent.

Speed Token.Description: Use this on a Doodle that doesn't have 6 stars to give them a bit more speed.

Cure Jelly.Description: Give this item to a Doodle to have it cure a status effect when the Doodle is inflicted with one. This item is consumed after one use.

Poison Taffy.Description: A taffy made in Von Sweets' Factory. Give this item to boost the damage of one Poison-type attack. This item is consumed after use.

Gold Laminate.Description: Give this item to a Doodle to preserve it, stopping it from evolving. If the Doodle is able to evolve, boost its Defense and Magical Defense by 50%.

Sickly Ooze.Description: Whenever this Doodle would inflict Poison, inflict Diseased instead.

Determination Headband.Description: Give this item to a Doodle. The Doodle may survive attacks that would otherwise cause it to faint.

Small Sprout.Description: Give this item to a Doodle to improve the damage of its Plant-type attacks.

Bandage.Description: These bandages heal a Doodle by 25 HP.

Spirit Candy Cube.Description: Some candy made in von Sweets' factory. Give this item to a Doodle to reduce the power of a Spirit-type attack. This item is consumed after use.

Magical Banana.Description: Use this on a Doodle in battle to temporarily raise its magic attack.

Melee Candy Cube.Description: Some candy made in von Sweets' factory. Give this item to a Doodle to reduce the power of a Melee-type attack. This item is consumed after use.

Sniper Scope.Description: Give this item to a Doodle. The holder, if they haven't taken damage yet this turn, has a boosted critical hit rate.

Food Taffy.Description: A taffy made in Von Sweets' Factory. Give this item to boost the damage of one Food-type attack. This item is consumed after use.

Medical Capsule.Description: Use this on a wild Doodle in an attempt to capture it. After being captured, the Doodle's health is fully restored .

Mythical Trinket.Description: You are more likely to meet doodles of Legend.

Magical Jelly.Description: Give this item to a Doodle to increase the power of one of their magical attacks. This item is consumed  after use.

Antidote.Description: Use this spray on a Doodle to cure their poisoning.
